# uptimekuma_notification_cellsynt (Resource)

Cellsynt SMS notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_cellsynt" "example" {
  name            = "Cellsynt SMS Notification"
  is_active       = true
  login           = "your_cellsynt_username"
  password        = "your_cellsynt_password"
  destination     = "+46701234567"
  originator      = "YourCompany"
  originator_type = "Numeric"
  allow_long_sms  = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `destination` (String) Recipient phone number
- `login` (String, Sensitive) Cellsynt account username
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `originator` (String) Sender name or phone number
- `password` (String, Sensitive) Cellsynt account password

### Optional

- `allow_long_sms` (Boolean) Allow sending SMS messages longer than 160 characters
- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `originator_type` (String) Type of originator (Numeric or Alphanumeric)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
